alert.note: Alert for Lane; Ness; Rush; Scott; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 20 at 1:02PM CST until December 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM WEDNESDAY TO NOON CST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Trego, Scott, Lane, Ness and Rush Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 9 PM Wednesday to noon CST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight Wednesday night to 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow amounts are expected to remain mainly less than 2 inches. However, snow will be fluffy and easily blown and drifted by intense north winds. Travel will be hazardous for several hours early Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
